Hello everyone,

I would like to download all the images from a file manager folder, compress and optimize them and reupload them.
But when I perform the manipulation, HubSpot creates copies rather than replacing? Even with the same name.
How do you manage to do this?

Thanks a lot :slightly_smiling_face:
How are you referencing the style sheets? Are you using {{get_asset_url()}} ?

Hey Guys, i have some general questions about "best-practices" for migrating a blog (and in a later stage the website) from the "old" integrated CMS to the new CMS-Hub. Do you have some resources which possibilities are out there to have a very smooth process of migrating to a new theme and the new CMS-Hub... Thank you. Hans
When someone uses the "download" option in a custom quote template to generate a pdf - does that actually use the print CSS, or does it just reduce the page down to a particular width and use that?
It appears that it does use print CSS.
